item.title: Ace Your Technical Interview Using Python
item.description:
Description

Do you feel overwhelmed by the prospect of having to find a new software engineering job because you dread the technical interviewing process? Have you been putting off submitting your job applications because you think you won't be ready to interview until you do "just one more" day of studying?

In this talk, you'll learn which concepts are the most important to study for entry-level roles and how to use your Python skills to convey your understanding of these concepts with confidence and clarity.
item.dc:creator: Erin Allard

item.title: How to Read Python You Didn't Write
item.dc:creator: Erin Allard
